author: epg
msg: optional string at the end of the operational log action rather
than logging a separate blame-merge-sensitive action.

author: epg
msg: Bind get_client_string callback of svn_ra_callbacks2_t for Python.
(svn_swig_py_setup_ra_callbacks): Fill in get_client_string field with it.
(test_namestring): Add test when URL starts with 'http'.  Since we
can't yet run check-swig-py over http, this never runs.  But gvn
tests this binding as of r636, so I know it works.

author: epg
msg: Refine operational logging for svn log.
(dav_svn__log_report): Add open and close parentheses for the space-
separated paths and revprops at the end, when logging the action, rather
than when first allocating the stringbuf.  Log limit,

author: cmpilato
msg: Provide a better implementation of the clientstring feature which was
first introduced in r28503 but reverted in r28513 due to a circular
The new implementation uses a callback to pull the string from the
client instead of using a static string.
(svn_ra_neon__open): Fetch and use the custom client string.
(svn_ra_serf__open): Fetch and store the custom client string.

author: epg
msg: (dav_svn__replay_report): Always log a path, even when it's the
repository root (this was effectively true already, as base_path
is never "" or NULL (at least today), but now it's explicit).
